Class CharacterString

Namespace
NDSH.Geospatial.Common.BasicTypes.Primitive.Text
Assembly
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.ISO19115.Ed2003.dll

The CharacterString is wrapper of a string which is used to represent textual information in a MD_Metadata_Type hierarchy, or database entity. The CharacterString allows to provide an INilReason if its Value is set to null.

[IsoType("CharacterString", WrapperName = "CharacterString_PropertyType", IsoType = IsoTypes.ComplexType)]
[JsonObject("CharacterString")]
public class CharacterString : ObservableDbEntity, IModel, IObservableModel, INotifyPropertyChanged, IDbId, INullableRefValue<string>, INilReasoned, IComparable<CharacterString>, IEquatable<CharacterString>

Properties

NilReason

Gets/Sets the NilReasonEntity that indicates the reason why the Value of this CharacterString is null.

public NilReasonEntity? NilReason { get; set; }

Property Value

NilReasonEntity

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown when attempting to set NilReason while Value is not null. This ensures that a reason for null cannot be assigned when an actual Value is present.

Value

Gets or sets the actual value associated with the metadata entity. This property is designed for XML and JSON serialization and represents a standardized textual representation of geospatial metadata values.

[JsonProperty("Value")]
public string? Value { get; set; }

Property Value

string
